Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the accuracy of the quote attributed to Thomas Jefferson.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Thomas Jefferson actually said the quote.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the quote is accurate without providing sufficient evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim could have alternative explanations for the origin of the quote, such as Abraham Lincoln's line about fooling all of the people some of the time.
